title: Brighton Beach Memoirs by Neil Simon

content.question: Write a thesis statement that you might use for an essay that analyzes how Simon uses literary elements and techniques to inform the reader’s understanding of Nora’s complex motivations. Write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

frqParts.text: Write a thesis statement that you might use for an essay that analyzes how Simon uses literary elements and techniques to inform the reader’s understanding of Nora’s complex motivations. Write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
